scripts.makepot: wp i18n make-pot . languages/$(basename $PWD).pot --skip-js --exclude=src,vendor,node_modules,build-release && wp i18n make-pot . languages/js-admin.pot --skip-php --include=assets/admin/build && wp i18n make-pot . languages/js-public.pot --skip-php --include=assets/public/build && msgcat --use-first languages/$(basename $PWD).pot languages/js-admin.pot languages/js-public.pot -o languages/$(basename $PWD).pot && rm languages/js-admin.pot && rm languages/js-public.pot
